amendment.description: An amendment to insert at the end of the bill the following new section: None of the funds made available in this Act to the Secretary of the Treasury may be used to take any action to enforce the rule submitted by the Comptroller of the Currency relating to bank activities and regulations, published at 69 Fed. Reg. 1895 (2004) or the rule submitted by the Comptroller of the Currency relating to bank activities and regulations, published at 69 Fed. Reg. 1904 (2004).

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Gutierrez amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Gutierrez.
